sentences: Ta on ehitaja ja teeb tööd ehtelt.
Olen väga uhke oma ehtsetest töödest.
context: The word 'ehtne' in Estonian is an adjective that means authentic, real, or genuine. It's used to describe something that is not fake or imitation - it has true value and represents the original quality. This can be applied to physical objects like jewelry, materials, products, as well as abstract concepts like feelings, emotions, or work. The word appears in various contexts where authenticity needs to be emphasized, from describing genuine materials to expressing honest emotions.
